title: Handheld
custom_preconds: Currently supports Android devices on 4.0 and above
custom_steps: When the user tests on Handheld devices
custom_expected: Then the user will verify the app launches

title: Tablet
custom_preconds: Currently supports Android devices on 4.0 and above
custom_steps: When the user installs on a Tablet
custom_expected: Then the user will mostly see if app launches properly (do not really need to conduct in-depth testing on the tablet)

title: Launcher Icon
custom_preconds: Given the app has been installed and views the homescreen
custom_steps: When the user looks at the launcher icon
custom_expected: Then they see a batter image, red on the left and and blue on the right, three stars on the red side and one star on the blue side, and the MiLB logo below the batter image

title: Text Below Launcher Icon
custom_preconds: Given the app has been installed and views the homescreen
custom_steps: When the user views the text below launcher image
custom_expected: Then the user verifies the text is clear and states 'First Pitch'

title: Splash Screen
custom_preconds: Given the user has launched the app
custom_steps: When the user views the splash screen
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the following:
First Pitch text over MiLB.com text, superimposed over a baseball image

title: Location Request Prompt
custom_preconds: Given the user has launched the app
custom_steps: When the user views the splash screen
custom_expected:
Then the user will see a location prompt request
And the user will be able to allow or deny

title: No Log In
custom_preconds: Given the app has been launched
custom_steps: When the user is on the app
custom_expected: Then the user will NOT see any app login anywhere in the app as it is not supported in Android

title: User is prompted to select favorite team upon initial app launch
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed the app
And the user has not entered the app previously
custom_steps: When the user first launches the app
custom_expected:
Then the user will be prompted with "Select Your Favorite Team" modal
And the user will have the option to set their favorite team
And the user will have the option to skip this step and advance within the app

title: All options are present during onboarding favorite team selection
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed the app
And the user has not accessed the app previously
custom_steps:
When the user has installed the app 
And they are prompted to select a favorite team during initial launch of the app
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the following Header: 
- "Select an Affiliate or a Class" (That bar shouldnâ€™t be clickable since there is no action on click)

And the app will give the user the option to select favorite team By Affiliate or by Class:
- Select by Affiliate
- Triple-A, Double-A, Class A Advanced, Class A Full Season, Class A Short Season, and Rookie

title: Select by Affiliate
custom_preconds: Given the user has been prompted to select a favorite team during initial launch of the app
custom_steps: When the user taps "Select By Affiliate"
custom_expected: Then the user will be given a list of 30 MLB teams

title: Selecting MLB Team
custom_preconds: Given the user has been prompted to select a favorite team during initial launch of the app
custom_steps: When the user taps an MLB team
custom_expected:
Then it will all be added as Favorite Teams (indicated by a star in selected state) 
And the user will see the following toast message: "All [MLB nickname] affiliates added to Favorites." E.G.: "All Ray affiliates added to Favorites."
And their Minor League teams will be displayed at the top (user must scroll to the top)

title: Tapping on Next
custom_preconds: Given the user has been prompted to select a favorite team during initial launch of the app
custom_steps: When the user taps on Next
custom_expected: Then the user is taken to the Notifications page

title: Notifications Page
custom_preconds: Given the user has been prompted to select a favorite team during initial launch of the app
custom_steps: When the user is on the Notifications page
custom_expected:
Then the notifications are toggled on by default 
and 
the favorite team will be indicated by a star

title: Tapping on Done
custom_preconds: Given the user has been prompted to select a favorite team during initial launch of the app
custom_steps: When the user taps on the 'Done' button on the upper right
custom_expected: Then the user should be taken directly to that first affiliate listed team's page

title: Viewing the Main Nav
custom_preconds: Given the user has been prompted to select a favorite team during initial launch of the app
custom_steps: When the user views the main nav
custom_expected: Then the favorite first three teams will be displayed at the top

title: Viewing the Team Page's Standings link
custom_preconds: Given the user has been prompted to select a favorite team during initial launch of the app
custom_steps: When the user views the Team Page's Standings link
custom_expected: Then the team(s) will be indicated as a favorite in the Team Page's Standings with it being listed in bold

title: Viewing the Scoreboard
custom_preconds: Given the user has been prompted to select a favorite team during initial launch of the app
custom_steps: When the user views the Scoreboard (accessed from the main nav)
custom_expected: Then the team(s) will be indicated as a favorite in the Daily Scoreboard with a "star" next to their name

title: Viewing the Teams
custom_preconds: Given the user has been prompted to select a favorite team during initial launch of the app
custom_steps: When the user views the Teams (accessed from the main nav)
custom_expected: Then the team(s) will be indicated as a favorite in the Teams with a "star" next to their name and by being listed as the first team(s) at the top

title: Selecting a Class
custom_preconds: Given the user has been prompted to select a favorite team during initial launch of the app
custom_steps:
When the user taps on the following classes (check all):
- Triple A
- Double A
- Class A Advanced
- Class A Full
- Class A Short
- Class A Rookie
custom_expected: Then the user will be given a list of all teams corresponding to each class

title: Selecting a Team
custom_preconds: Given the user has been prompted to select a favorite team during initial launch of the app
custom_steps: When the user chooses a team
custom_expected:
Then the team will be added to the list of favorites (indicated by a star in selected state)
And the user will see the following toast message: "[Club CITY Name] added to Favorites." e.g.: "Lehigh Valley added to Favorites."
And their Minor League teams will be displayed at the top (user must scroll to the top)

title: Tapping on Next
custom_preconds: Given the user has been prompted to select a favorite team during initial launch of the app
custom_steps: When the user taps on Next
custom_expected: Then the user is taken to the Notifications page

title: Notifications Page
custom_preconds: Given the user has been prompted to select a favorite team during initial launch of the app
custom_steps: When the user is on the Notifications page
custom_expected:
Then the notifications will be toggled on by default
and
the favorite team will be indicated by a star

title: Tapping on Done
custom_preconds: Given the user has been prompted to select a favorite team during initial launch of the app
custom_steps: When the user taps on the 'Done' button on the upper right
custom_expected: Then the user should be taken directly to that team's page

title: Viewing the Main Nav
custom_preconds: Given the user has been prompted to select a favorite team during initial launch of the app
custom_steps: When the user views the main nav
custom_expected: Then the favorite team will be displayed at the top

title: Viewing the Team Page's Standings link
custom_preconds: Given the user has been prompted to select a favorite team during initial launch of the app
custom_steps: When the user views the Team Page's Standings link
custom_expected: Then the team will be indicated as a favorite in the Team Page's Standings with it being listed in bold

title: Viewing the Scoreboard
custom_preconds: Given the user has been prompted to select a favorite team during initial launch of the app
custom_steps: When the user views the Scoreboard (accessed from the main nav)
custom_expected: Then the team will be indicated as a favorite in the Daily Scoreboard with a "star" next to their name

title: Viewing the Teams
custom_preconds: Given the user has been prompted to select a favorite team during initial launch of the app
custom_steps: When the user views the Teams (accessed from the main nav)
custom_expected:
Then the team will be indicated as a favorite in the Teams with a "star" next to their name
and by being listed as the first team at the top

custom_steps:

title: List of Favorite Teams in Navigation Menu matches list in Favorite Teams section
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed the app
And they have previously selected multiple Favorite Teams
custom_steps: When the user opens the Navigation Menu
custom_expected:
Then their previously selected Favorite Teams will be listed as the first option(s) in the Navigation Menu
And the list of Favorite Teams in the Navigation Menu will match the list in the Favorite Teams section in Settings
And the order of Favorite Teams in the Navigation Menu will match the order in the Favorite Teams section in Settings

title: No Class Selected
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed the app
And has not launched the app previously
And the user is on the "Favorite Teams By Class" page and does NOT select any option
And the user taps "Next"
custom_steps:
When the user is on the "Favorite Teams By Class" page and does NOT select any option
And the user taps "Next"
custom_expected: Then the user will be taken to Notifications

title: No Class Selected, Scoreboard
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed the app
And has not launched the app previously
And the user is on the "Favorite Teams By Class" page and does NOT select any option
And the user taps "Next"
custom_steps: When the user is on the Notifications page and taps on Done
custom_expected:
Then the user is dropped into the Triple-A Scoreboard section of the app by default
And no favorite teams will be indicated in any sections of the app

title: Class Selected, No Team Selected
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed the app
And has not launched the app previously
custom_steps:
When the user is on the "Favorite Teams By Class" page
And chooses a Class of Favorite Team (i.e. AAA, AA, etc.) 
And the user chooses NOT to add a favorite team
And the user taps "Next"
custom_expected: Then the user will be taken to Notifications

title: Class Selected, No Team Selected, Scoreboard
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed the app
And has not launched the app previously
And the user is on the "Favorite Teams By Class" page
And chooses a Class of Favorite Team (i.e. AAA, AA, etc.) 
And the user chooses NOT to add a favorite team
And the user taps "Next"
custom_steps: When the user is on the Notifications page and taps on Done
custom_expected:
Then the user is dropped into the Triple-A Scoreboard section of the app by default
And no favorite teams will be indicated in any sections of the app

title: Notifications with Favorite Team
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed the app
And the user is in the on boarding process
custom_steps: When a user has a favorite team set and navigates to the Notifications screen
custom_expected:
Then the user will view the notifications toggled on by default for the following:
- Notifications
- Sound
- MiLB News
- Favorite Teams (Home Game Reminder, Game Start, Game End, Scoring Plays, Lead Change)

And the rest of the teams will be listed in alphabetic order with the notifications toggled off by default.

title: Notifications with NO Favorite Team
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed the app
And the user is in the on boarding process
custom_steps: When a user does not a select a favorite team and navigates to the Notifications screen
custom_expected:
Then the user will view the notifications toggled on by default for the following:
- Notifications
- Sound
- MiLB News

And the rest of the teams will be listed in alphabetic order with the notifications toggled off by default.
- All Teams (Home Game Reminder, Game Start, Game End, Scoring Plays, Lead Change)

title: All Notifications Toggled Off
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed the app
And the user is in the on boarding process' Notifications page
custom_steps: When the user is on the Notifications page and toggles off all the notifications
custom_expected: Then all the notifications should be toggled off and remain in that state

title: Individual Notifications Toggled Off
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed the app
And the user is in the on boarding process' Notifications page
custom_steps: When the user is on the Notifications page and toggles off individual notifications
custom_expected: Then the individual notifications toggled off should remain in that state

title: All Notifications Toggled On
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed the app
And the user is in the on boarding process' Notifications page
custom_steps: When the user is on the Notifications page and toggles on all notifications
custom_expected: Then all the notifications toggled on should remain in that state

title: Individual Notifications Toggled On
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed the app
And the user is in the on boarding process' Notifications page
custom_steps: When the user is on the Notifications page and toggles on individual notifications
custom_expected: Then the individual notifications toggled on should remain in that state

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user chooses a team
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the team will be added to the list of favorites  (indicated by a star in selected state)
And the user will see the following toast message: "[Club CITY Name] added to Favorites." e.g.: "Lehigh Valley added to Favorites."
And their Minor League teams will be displayed at the top (user must scroll to the top)

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps on Next
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user is taken to the Notifications page

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user is taken to the Notifications page
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the favorite team will be indicated by a star

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps on the 'Done' button on the upper right
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user should be taken directly to that team's page

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user views the main nav
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the favorite team will be displayed at the top

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user views the Team Page's Standings link
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the team(s) will be indicated as a favorite in the Team Page's Standings with it being listed in bold

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user views the Scoreboard (accessed from the main nav)
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the team(s) will be indicated as a favorite in the Daily Scoreboard with a "star" next to their name

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user views the Teams (accessed from the main nav)
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the team(s) will be indicated as a favorite in the Teams with a "star" next to their name and by being listed as the first team(s) at the top

custom_steps_separated.content: DO NOT TEST
custom_steps_separated.expected:
NOT RELEVANT:
And the team(s) will be indicated as a favorite in the News with a "star" next to their name

custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be given a list of all teams in that class only

custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then each team will be indicated as a Favorite Team  (indicated by a star in selected state)
And the user will see the following toast message: "[Club CITY Name] added to Favorites." e.g.: "Lehigh Valley added to Favorites."
And their Minor League teams will be displayed at the top (user must scroll to the top)

custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user is taken to the Notifications page

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user is taken to the Notifications page
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the favorite team(s) will be indicated by a star

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps on the 'Done' button on the upper right
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user should be taken directly to the team page of the first team listed

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user views the main nav
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the first three favorite team will be displayed at the top

title: List of Favorite Teams in Navigation Menu matches list in Favorite Teams section
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed the app
And they have previously selected multiple Favorite Teams
custom_steps: When the user opens the Navigation Menu
custom_expected:
Then their previously selected Favorite Teams will be listed as the first option(s) in the Navigation Menu
And the list of Favorite Teams in the Navigation Menu will match the list in the Favorite Teams section in Settings
And the order of Favorite Teams in the Navigation Menu will match the order in the Favorite Teams section in Settings

title: No Class Selected
custom_preconds:
Given the user has installed the app
And has not launched the app previously

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user is on the "Favorite Teams By Class" page and does NOT select any option
And the user taps "Next"
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be taken to Notifications page

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user is on the Notifications page and taps on Done
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user is dropped into the Triple-A Scoreboard section of the app by default
And no favorite teams will be indicated in any sections of the app

custom_preconds: Given the user has been prompted to select a favorite team during initial launch of the app
custom_steps: DO NOT TEST
custom_expected:
NOT RELEVANT:
And the team(s) will be indicated as a favorite in the News with a "star" next to their name
